sampleDescriptions: Wording in the BBA regarding the role of the MMCO and CMS;  Specifically, discussion re: page 326 of the BBA - CONFORMING AMENDMENT TO RESPONSIBILITIES OF FEDERAL COORDINATED HEALTH CARE OFFICE - Sect
